product_name: LancomeTonique Confort Hydrating Hyaluronic Acid Toner
summary: SummaryLancome's Tonique Confort Hydrating Hyaluronic Acid Toner is a lightweight toner with hyaluronic acid that significantly hydrates your skin in just 30 minutes.
details: DetailsBenefitsWorks to strengthen your skin's natural moisture barrierFormulated for all types of skin types, including sensitiveSkin Concerns: Dullness, redness, smoothnessSafety Measures: Suitable for all skin types, including sensitive; tested on sensitive skinTexture: Milky texture for a lightweight, refreshing feelWhy use a toner: Prep & hydrate skin for the rest of your skincare routine with a toner. This essential step sweeps away impurities, leaving your complexion soft, soothed, and ready to embrace the benefits of your skincare routine.Key IngredientsHyaluronic Acid: A powerful humectant that is known to provide intense hydration & plumping the skinNatural-origin Centifolia Rose Extract: Known to provide moisture to the skin & soothe skinSqualane: Known to strengthen skin's moisture barrierResearch ResultsIndulge your skin with this milky toner, its luxurious texture melting effortlessly into your skin. This hydrating formula instantly softens and soothes, leaving your skin hydrated for up to 24 hours. Experience the comfort of deeply hydrated skin in just 30 minutes.*Provides instant & long-lasting hydration up to 24hrs**Skin hydration increased by +52% half an hour after application**Experience the difference: 94% of consumers agree, toner leaves behind a comfortable, lightweight finish on skin.***Immediately:84% agree skin felt softer***82% agree skin felt hydrated & moisturized***After 1 week:89% agree product gently removes impurities without stripping***80% agree skin felt smoother***After 4 weeks:94% agree felt hydrated & moisturized***84% agree skin tone looks more even***81% agree skin appearance looks improved***Experience a visible transformation: After one month, 81% of consumers agreed skin reveals more healthy and radiant.****Clinical test with 24 women after 30 minutes**Clinical test with 24 women after 24 hours***Based on a multi-phototype self-assessment test of 167 women after 4 weeksItem 2632964How To UseApply with a cotton pad, this method is ideal when used as a cleansing toner and makeup remover, as excess impurities and leftover makeup residues are wiped away with the cotton pad.Saturate a cotton pad and gently sweep toner with hyaluronic acid cross the face, neck and décolleté twice a day (morning and evening).No rinse needed.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Glycerin, Malva Sylvestris Flower/Leaf/Stem Water - Mallow Flower/Leaf/Stem Water, Rosa Centifolia Flower Water, Squalane, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Hydroxide, Hydroxyacetophenone, Caprylyl Glycol, Citric Acid, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Chlorphenesin, Parfum/Fragrance (F.I.L. N70040628/1).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply with a cotton pad, this method is ideal when used as a cleansing toner and makeup remover, as excess impurities and leftover makeup residues are wiped away with the cotton pad.Saturate a cotton pad and gently sweep toner with hyaluronic acid cross the face, neck and décolleté twice a day (morning and evening).No rinse needed.
ingredients: Malva Sylvestris Flower/Leaf/Stem Water - Mallow Flower/Leaf/Stem Water

reviews.headline: Not the same!
reviews.comments: So disappointed!  The packaging is different.  The salesclerk said the formula wasn't changed.  She was wrong.  It is now the same as any witch hazel astringent and dried out my face.  Price is still the same but no longer a silky toner.  Will not be buying again.  And was a buyer of this for many years.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: I was happy with the product and delivery

reviews.headline: The old one is more better
reviews.comments:
This Toner was  10/10 it really help with dry skin  but also  took off the dirt !
This New Formula is not hydrating and burns skin and leaves face tight i very disappointed! 
Yall need original one back asap !

reviews.headline: They changed the formula (NOT WORTH THE MONEY)
reviews.comments:
I have been using Lancôme for the past 6 years. I noticed immediately that this is not the product I have known throughout the years. It smells different, the texture is a bit sticky and has a liquid soap feel on my face and skin. 

I decided to compare the ingredients from my other bottle and sure enough, the formula is completely different. I will never buy this product again unless they go back to its original ingredients. Not worth the money. I am highly disappointed is Lancome. I will be making changes with my other Lancome products if they do this with any of them. Great product gone BAD

reviews.headline: Love this toner!
reviews.comments: I have used Lancome products for 50 years, and have always been pleased with them.

reviews.headline: highly fragranced
reviews.comments: this product seems very overpriced for what it is. despite being advertised as 'great for sensitive skin', It is VERY fragranced (floral) and that's never great for skincare. there are definitely cheaper/better options out there.

reviews.headline: They changed the formula.
reviews.comments: I've been using this toner for over a decade and they didn't just changed the packaging but also the formula. No more almond oil or rosa damasco. The color and texture is way different and it burned my skin. I only wore it once. I compared ingredients and textures its sad that an amazing product gets changed so drastically for non good reason.

reviews.headline: Hydrating
reviews.comments: I've purchased this product before and I loved it. I still do but I'm not sure if it's the same as the previous one that I got, It seems the bottle was changed. A little goes a long way and it seems like it's going to last a while too, I don't know if I'll repurchase or just find more affordable products.

reviews.headline: Hands down my fave toner of all time!
reviews.comments: First & forever toner I'll be buying! Super hydrating on the skin perfect for applying after cleanser. Love mixing it in with my Lancôme foundation best combo for a more hydrating and smooth base while doing my makeup. Not sticky at all!

reviews.headline: This changed my skin
reviews.comments: I started using this twice a day about a year ago. My skin is noticeably smoother and fresher. I am 68 years old. Several people have asked me what I'm doing differently to my facial skin. I've never used a toner that felt this good when you put it on. I'm sold!

reviews.headline: yes I would buy this again
reviews.comments: I use it twice a day. It is very refreshing.

faceoff_positive.comments: I've purchased this product before and I loved it. I still do but I'm not sure if it's the same as the previous one that I got, It seems the bottle was changed. A little goes a long way and it seems like it's going to last a while too, I don't know if I'll repurchase or just find more affordable products.

I have been using Lancôme for the past 6 years. I noticed immediately that this is not the product I have known throughout the years. It smells different, the texture is a bit sticky and has a liquid soap feel on my face and skin. 

I decided to compare the ingredients from my other bottle and sure enough, the formula is completely different. I will never buy this product again unless they go back to its original ingredients. Not worth the money. I am highly disappointed is Lancome. I will be making changes with my other Lancome products if they do this with any of them. Great product gone BAD
